root.name: Godzilla: Destroy All Monsters Melee
root.description: StoryThe dominant alien race known as the Vortaak have taken control of all the world's monsters and set them loose to eliminate mankind. Godzilla is somehow able to break free of their control, and sets forth and defeats the Vortaak's monster army one by one.Playable CharactersAnguirusDestoroyahGiganGodzilla 90'sGodzilla 2000King GhidorahKiryu (Xbox exclusive)Mechagodzilla 2Mecha-King GhidorahMegalonOrgaRodan
